messages.content: I finally moved into my new place in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.
I'm really liking it. My neighbor Mike helped me move, super nice guy.
That's great to have handy neighbors!
He fixed my bike yesterday too, I owe him $50 for parts.
Wow, sounds like he really came through for you!
I enjoy my morning coffee at Devoción on Grand Street.
That sounds like a lovely spot! Do you go there every day?
Pretty much. I also visit the hardware store 2 blocks away on Bedford Ave for small repairs.
Perfect for quick fixes! Do you have any projects in mind?
On Sundays, I love going to the farmers market at McCarren Park.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day! What do you usually buy there?
I pick up fresh veggies and sometimes flowers.
Nice! Fresh flowers always brighten up a space.
After the market, I sometimes grab coffee at Devoción.
Perfect way to relax after shopping! Do you have a favorite drink?
I love their cappuccino. It’s the best in the area.
I’ll have to check it out! Have you met any other neighbors there?

reference_answer.text: My neighbor Mike who fixed my bike, I owe him $50.
